name: Die, zombie sausage, die!
description:
Arcade for the little ones. Hold on to the table against the zombie sausages as long as possible. Make your way to the top of the leaderboard.
You have to survive among the constantly coming zombie sausages. Every minute they are more and more. You will push, slap you slaps and cuffs. Do not be afraid and do not be discouraged you will have a chance to become the best survivalist!
